function.description:
Returns the difference between two dates.
By default the function will return the absolute difference. Optionally you can set 'absolute' to false to get the relative difference.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Calculating date difference in a total hours unit.
Everything prefixed with total will give the difference in the specified suffix, e.g. 1 hour in totalMinutes = 60 minutes, in totalSeconds = 3600 seconds, etc.
All other properties are a specification of the total difference, e.g. 25.05 hours = 1 day, 1 hour, 3 minutes. However, 25.05 hours in totalDays is 1.04375, in totalCenturies is 2.8577e-05, etc.
